content: प्रमथ् --मंथ् {c1c} {c9c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To churn; प्रमथ्यमानो (समुद्रो) गिरिणेव भूयः <ls>R. 13. 14.</ls> {@--2@} To harass, trouble excessively, annoy, torment. {@--3@} To strike down, bruise, hurt. {@--4@} To tear off or cut. {@--5@} To lay waste, devastate. {@--6@} To kill, destroy; <ls>Māl. 4. 9</ls>, <ls n="Māl.">9. 27.</ls> {@--7@} To agitate, stir about. {@--8@} <ab>Ved.</ab> To rob. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To harass, annoy.
